countryData.title: App Metrics and Label Data
countryData.description: In support of Open Science, AURORA hereby discloses the metrics used by the Energy Tracker to calculate carbon emissions, energy usage and the labels.

downloads.description: We offer the above metrics and label data for download.

reportSnippets.genderDistribution: Of those users, {femaleCount} identify as female, {maleCount} as male, {nonBinaryCount} as non-binary, and {otherCount} as other.
reportSnippets.totalConsumptions: In total, those users have created {totalConsumptions} consumptions.
reportSnippets.consumptionBreakdown: {transportationCount} are related to transportation, {electricityCount} to electricity, and {heatingCount} to heating.
reportSnippets.totalEmissions: This amounts to a total of {totalEmissions}{unit} emissions or {totalEnergy} kWh of energy used.
reportSnippets.emissionsByCategory: {transportationEmissions}{unit} are from transportation ({transportationEnergy} kWh), {electricityEmissions}{unit} from electricity ({electricityEnergy} kWh), and {heatingEmissions}{unit} from heating ({heatingEnergy} kWh).
